name: Odd-Eyes Baby Dragon
text: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Odd-Eyes" monster or 1 "Spiral Flame Strike" from your Deck to your hand. If this card is face-up in the Extra Deck: You can banish this card; Special Summon 1 "Odd-Eyes" monster from your Deck or place 1 "Odd-Eyes" monster from your Deck into your Pendulum Zone. You can only use 1 effect of "Odd-Eyes Baby Dragon" per turn and only once that turn.
pendulum_text: Once per turn: You can target 1 "Odd-Eyes" monster you control; it can make up to 3 attacks on monsters this turn.
